name: Crespo
description: Crespo will enable you to track sophisticated real time investors to locate and follow market whales with the aim of learning or collaborating with them. Here, whales refer to seasoned traders, large holders of cryptocurrency tokens, mining pools or key executives of companies owning cryptocurrency tokens. Crespo Platform will collaborate with leading whales to offer you, as a trader, a program that will allow you to learn about trading and investing in cryptocurrencies. You will also be able to gather and verify information about the whales. You will be able to verify all trading transactions to ensure there is no falsification of information. It will also use the Crespo CSO Tokens as a reward incentive and for all transactions on the platform
